title: Why Does Frau Blücher’s Name Scare Horses in ‘Young Frankenstein’?
subtitle: For some of us, the desire to believe we've been let in on a piece of secret knowledge can overpower our good sense.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The horses in 'Young Frankenstein' react violently to mention of Frau Blücher's name because it means 'glue' in German.
